item.title: Principles of Colors
item.description: ColorTeller I wrote a python package called colorteller to help us manage and benchmark colors. Basic Concepts of Colors Color Wheel and Color Sphere There are two dimensions in the color wheel: Hue Saturation When we add another dimension, lightness, to the wheel, we have a color sphere (1, 2). Many color systems have been invented. Color wheel and color sphere are two examples of them.
